text: Elazig Gazi Caddesi (Turkish: Elazığ Gazi Caddesi Kentsel Tasarımı) is the first urban design project in Elazığ, Turkey. == Geography == The Elaziğ Gazi Caddesi is at the historical center of Elazig. Its altitude is . It starts from in front of the Elaziğ Öğretmenevi and continues to the west. == History == Since inception of the Elaziğ, Gazi Caddesi was always a major gathering place for the people. As the growth of the city of Elazığ step by step site surrounded by the high density mix used buildings. At 2005 Municipality of Elazığ completed the application of Gazi Caddesi urban design project and opened to the public. == Design == Elazığ Gazi Caddesi urban design project was developed in 2004 by Turkish landscape architect Serpil Öztekin Erdem. == References == Category:Parks in Elazığ Category:Urban public parks Category:1943 establishments in Turkey
title: Elazığ Gazi Caddesi
